unnormalised: Planning a trip to Vaishno Devi next month, hopefully the rush won't be too bad around 15/07. Heard you can book a helicopter for Rs. 2000 per person to save time, bhai.
normalised: Planning a trip to Vaishno Devi next month, hopefully the rush won't be too bad around fifteenth July. Heard you can book a helicopter for rupee two thousand per person to save time, bhai.
